thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 2 of 12
thread.title: Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text:
I have ordered a number of items over the years, two cameras, and a lens for one of these cameras, separately.
I selected two day shipment. Beach Camera is in New Jersey, and I live in NYC (one of the boroughs). In two instances my order arrived the next day; in the other, in two days. I am amazed.
Their prices are fair, and with each delivery I received a discount card to apply to my next order. This is an added bonus.
